si.title: இன்றைய நாணயமாற்று விகிதம்
body_lines: එක්සත් ජනපද ඩොලර් මිලදී ගැනීමේ මිල රුපියල් 288.3393 කි.

en.title: Today's currency exchange rate
body_lines: The US dollar purchasing price was 288.3393 rupees and the sales price were 297.0686 rupees based on the currency exchange rate released by the Central Bank on Monday (30).
